author: Simon Difford
description: Chocolate orange with coffee and cream.
name: Café Gates
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
22.5 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: Place bar spoon in glass, POUR first three ingredients and top up with coffee, then float cream by pouring over the back of a spoon
